name: rsem-calculate-credibility-intervals
usage: rsem-calculate-credibility-intervals reference_name imdName statName confidence nCV nSpC nMB [-p #Threads] [--seed seed] [--pseudo-count pseudo_count] [-q]

options.description: number of threads which user wants to use. (default: 1)
Set seed for the random number generator used in simulation. The seed should be a 32-bit unsigned integer.
